buri.ddmsence.util

Class DDMSReader

  • Object
    • buri.ddmsence.util.DDMSReader

  • public class DDMSReader
extends Object
    Reader class which loads an XML file containing DDMS information and converts it into XOM elements.

    This parsing performs schema validation against a local set of DDMS/ISM schemas.

    Since:
    0.9.b
    Author:
    Brian Uri!

    • Constructor Detail

      • DDMSReader

        public DDMSReader(DDMSVersion version)
           throws org.xml.sax.SAXException
        Constructor

        Schemas are loaded in reverse order, so the latest, greatest copy is always first to be looked for.

        Creates a DDMSReader which can process various versions of DDMS and GML
        Throws:
        org.xml.sax.SAXException

    • Method Detail

      • getLocalSchemaLocation

        protected String getLocalSchemaLocation(String schemaLocation)
        Returns the full path to a local schema copy, based on the relative location from the properties file. The full path will have spaces escaped as %20, to resolve Issue 50 in the DDMSence Issue Tracker.
        Parameters:
        schemaLocation - the relative schema location as specified in the properties file
        Returns:
        the full path to the schema (generally this is in the JAR file)
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the schema could not be found.

      • validateWithSchema

        public static void validateWithSchema(DDMSVersion version,
                                      String resourceXML)
                               throws InvalidDDMSException
        Attempts to build an Element from a Resource XML string. Element-based constructors for a Resource are automatically validated against a schema when the XML parser loads it. This method allows the data-driven constructors for a Resource to do a final confirmation that none of the data breaks any schema rules.
        Parameters:
        version - the DDMSVersion of the resource
        resourceXML - the XML of the resource to check
        Throws:
        InvalidDDMSException - if the resource is invalid

      • getElement

        public nu.xom.Element getElement(File file)
                          throws IOException,
                                 InvalidDDMSException
        Creates a XOM element representing the root XML element in the file.

        The implementation of this method delegates to the Reader-based overloaded method.

        Parameters:
        file - the file containing the XML document
        Returns:
        a XOM element representing the root node in the document
        Throws:
        IOException
        InvalidDDMSException

        Returns:

      • getExternalSchemaLocations

        public String getExternalSchemaLocations()
        Returns the external schema locations. The returned string will contain a space-delimited set of XMLNamespace/SchemaLocation pairs.
        Returns:
        the string containing all schema locations

      • addExternalSchemaLocation

        public void addExternalSchemaLocation(String xmlNamespace,
                                      String schemaLocation)
        Add additional schema locations to those already known by this DDMSReader. This can be used to reference external schemas for validation of the Extensible Layer in DDMS 2.0 - 4.1.
        Parameters:
        xmlNamespace - the unique XML namespace for the schema content
        schemaLocation - the accessible location of the XML Schema file to be used for validation
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if the DDMSReader already knows about the specified xmlNamespace
